attributes.action: Reinstate Imperial measure over metric on all products, media etc
attributes.additional_details: We WON the right to keep our measurement why are media, government, retial and others pushing to become EUROPEANS!  I am British and proud to be British!  We built the world with Imperial measurement to walk away is to cede to a faceless world crowd.  Be proud, be patriotic, vote to keep our way of life!
